#id=1
#text=A Library is a great way to re-live the past .
#id=2
#text=It 's a magical place where you can rent a book , and return it at a leisurely pace .
#id=3
#text=Now-a-days there are many digital options so the Library has become all but extinct .
#id=4
#text=On the plus side they may have some very rare finds that you can review .
#id=5
#text=In order to borrow a book from the library , head to your local one and start browsing their selection .
#id=6
#text=You can read the back of these books for a summary on the topics covered in the book .
#id=7
#text=Once you have selected a book or two , locate your closest librarian desk and bring the books over .
#id=8
#text=They will allow you to register and sign out these books , due back at another time .
#id=9
#text=Take them home and make sure to enjoy them by a fireplace , or with a small lit candle .
#text=Once you have completed these books , or grown tired of them , you can head back to the Library to return them .
